allBlogsData.title: Translating Your Next.js Apps
allBlogsData.description: If you intend your product to be used by people residing in non-English speaking countries, you will have to make your app multilingual. In this post, we will be looking at how you can quickly & easily translate your app into multiple languages.

allBlogsData.title: Ricing Arch Linux
allBlogsData.description: This is a guide for ricing your Arch Linux desktops. We will be going over how you can use and customise by dotfiles to make the computer setup of your dreams.

allBlogsData.title: Using Apple Emojis in Linux
allBlogsData.description: Hello everyone! In this quick tutorial, we will just be taking at how to replace the default Google Emojis with Apple emojis.

allBlogsData.title: Making a Discord Bot in Golang
allBlogsData.description: Hey all! Hope you are having a wonderful day or night. Today, we will be going over how we can make a Discord Bot in Golang using the discord.go library!
